name: Doki Doki Your Bully: Natsuki
storyline: In this short story, we'll experience a message that is widespread but undoubtedly ignored. Follow the story of the protagonist having trouble dealing with this bully, until his best friend, Natsuki, intervenes.
summary: Doki Doki: Your Bully – Natsuki is a fan-made mod for Doki Doki Literature Club! that reimagines the relationship between the protagonist and Natsuki, transforming it into a tense and emotional experience centered around bullying, personal struggles, and eventual character growth.

videos.name: Gameplay Video
videos.title: Natsuki is a Bully?! | Your Bully: Natsuki (DDLC Mod)
